title: Strengthening CS Practical Competencies: Customized Strategy Design for Improving Programming Learning Outcomes

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of basic programming syntax and experience with simple projects
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: The ability to select and apply optimal programming strategies (generative/completion) based on learner types is evaluated
Project-based assessments enable the design and implementation of programming solutions applicable to real work environments
Learners can analyze ≥3 issues arising in team projects using digital collaboration tools (Slack, Trello, MS Teams), derive solutions, and produce a report achieving ≥80% team satisfaction.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
